name: Product Table
description: Display products in customizable table format with customer group-specific pricing

settings.label: Product Table ID
settings.helpText: Enter the Product Table ID from your Gadget admin panel. Example: product-table-1759330856855-hqlbdgy

settings.content:
How to get your Product Table ID:
1. Go to your Gadget admin panel
2. Navigate to the Product Tables page
3. Click the 'Copy Product Table ID' button next to your product table
4. Paste the ID into the field above
